instruction: Think of a motivational quote that you have read in a book. Try to keep it positive and sweet.
output:
"Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle." - Christian D. Larson

This quote is a reminder that we all have the power within us to overcome any obstacle or challenge we may face. It encourages us to have faith in ourselves and our abilities, and to trust that we have the strength and resilience to overcome any adversity. This quote is a positive and uplifting message that can help us stay motivated and focused on our goals, even when things get tough.
